## FrameStats class

Class containing all counters, timers and events of the current frame.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class FrameStats 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [entries](./harp-mapview.framestats.entries.md) |  | Map&lt;string, number&gt; |  |
|  [messages](./harp-mapview.framestats.messages.md) |  | string\[\] |  |

## Methods

|  Method | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [addMessage(message)](./harp-mapview.framestats.addmessage.md) |  | Add a text message to the frame, like "Font XYZ has been loaded" |
|  [addValue(name, value)](./harp-mapview.framestats.addvalue.md) |  | Add a value to the current value of the performance number. If the performance is not known, it will be initialized with <code>value</code>. |
|  [getValue(name)](./harp-mapview.framestats.getvalue.md) |  | Retrieve the value of the performance number. |
|  [reset()](./harp-mapview.framestats.reset.md) |  | Reset all known performance values to <code>0</code> and the messages to <code>undefined</code>. |
|  [setValue(name, value)](./harp-mapview.framestats.setvalue.md) |  | Set the value of the performance number. |
